contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 21, 1971 D Tyldesley Contest (Section B)
Tyldesley Contest (Section B) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Tyldesley Contest tyldesley-contest-section-b
Sir Fred Longworth High School, Tyldesley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and trophy, 3rd £8 and cup. Best trombone - Boothstown. Best Horn - Hindley. Best euphonium - Ifton. Best cornet - Latchford. 2nd annual contest promoted by Tyldesley Band. 10 bands competed.
May 20, 2015, 8:21 p.m. May 18, 2016, 9:18 a.m.
1 Latchford Fred Ingham
2 Marple Band D. Langley
3 Ifton Colliery Band Eric Foster
4 Hindley Granville Jennings
Unknown Result Central Manchester Silver P. Casson
Unknown Result Ellenbrook & Boothstown F. Curran
Unknown Result Windsor Salford J. Clayton
Unknown Result Norman Memorial Band J. Crich
Unknown Result Bedford (Leigh) Band G. A. Littlewood
Unknown Result Trinity Girls Band Granville Jennings
Withdrawn Bolton (Hoover) Band E. Foulkes
